headline: CenterPoint Energy: A Particularly Well-Positioned Utility
summary: CenterPoint Energy targets 11% rate base and 7%-9% EPS growth through 2030, underpinned by a $65 billion 10-year capital plan. Click to read why CNP is a Buy.
